Text.content:
Element settings in OpenCms control the overall layout of web pages, the arrangement of contents on a page up to the fine granular formatting of individual content parts.

Content formatting, in the same way, is available via the JSON API. Editorial teams in this way can decide upon the layout and the individual style of contents in a mobile application in a fine-grained way. It is also possible to configure different element settings for different target applications.
